name: Google Images Full View - Max Width
description:
This userstyle is for "Google Image Basic and Ripper in One" Greasemonkey script

Scale the large images to the width of the browser viewing area (aspect ratio is kept)

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.
